answer:
If you meet the eligiblity criteria for publicly funded (free) flu vaccine here in BC, it doesn't matter if you are from Alberta. To find a flu clinic near you, check here. Flu vaccine is usually available some time in October.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## If you meet the eligiblity criteria for publicly funded (free) flu vaccine here in BC, it doesn't matter if you are from Alberta.

To find a flu clinic near you, check here.

## Flu vaccine is usually available some time in October.

Immunization Nurse
question: I don't have a BC care card, I'm from AB and have a valid AHC card, can I get my flu shot in Vancouver as I'm not going back to AB until late Dec. Thanks
question_variation_1: can flu shot be shot in bc vancouver
question_variation_2: can flu shot be given in vancouver alabama
